section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgments and opinion of the Court to announce in two cases, 75-6521, Abney against the United States and for reasons stated and opinion filed this morning with the clerk.
The judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit was affirmed.
Mr. Justice White concurred in the judgment.
